name: Normal Tracks
description: Standard tracks, manufactured by Mobilit√© Duvant, it provides a good rotation speed and a decent grip on most surfaces.

name: Fast Tracks
description: Tracks designed for speed, they offer a higher rotation speed and less weight, but sacrifice grip in return.

name: High Grip Tracks
description: Designed and manufactured by Transporti Aurelia, these tracks were made to provide more grip than other tracks for the mountainous terrain of the Kingdom of Arsilia.
